snippet: A mosque in Joplin burned to the ground early Monday in the second fire at the Islamic center in little more than a month, officials said.
abstract: Mosque in Joplin, Mo, burns to the ground in the second fire at the Islamic center in little more than a month; authorities are investigating whether the latest fire is also the result of arson.
lead_paragraph: A mosque in Joplin burned to the ground early Monday in the second fire at the Islamic center in little more than a month, officials said.

headline.main: Missouri: After Arson a Month Ago, a Second Fire Destroys Joplin Mosque
headline.print_headline: Missouri: After Arson a Month Ago, a Second Fire Destroys Joplin Mosque
